abstract: Oracle sold $5 billion of bonds Wednesday, in what was the biggest corporate bond sale since January, according to Dealogic. The proceeds will help fund the software giant’s pending acquisition of BEA Systems.
lead_paragraph: Oracle sold $5 billion of bonds Wednesday, in what was the biggest corporate bond sale since January, according to Dealogic. The proceeds will help fund the software giant’s pending acquisition of BEA Systems.

headline.main: Oracle Raises $5 Billion in Bond Sale
